Package com.j2igf.framework.graphics.visual

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
com.j2igf.framework.graphics.visual.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
FontAtlas, TileSet
public class Sprite extends Object
This class is responsible for handling sprites.
Author:
Aryan Rai

  • Constructor Details

    • Sprite

      protected Sprite()
      This is the default constructor of the Sprite class.

    • Sprite

      public Sprite(Sprite sprite)
      This is the copy constructor of the Sprite class.
      Parameters:
      sprite - The sprite to copy.

    • Sprite

      public Sprite(int width, int height)
      This is a parameterized constructor of the Sprite class.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the sprite.
      height - The height of the sprite.

    • Sprite

      public Sprite(String path)
      This is a parameterized constructor of the Sprite class.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of an image file to load as a Sprite.

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render(Renderer renderer, int x, int y)
      This method renders the sprite to the screen.
      Parameters:
      renderer - The renderer to use.
      x - The x coordinate to render the sprite at.
      y - The y coordinate to render the sprite at.

    • renderTransformed

      public void renderTransformed(Renderer renderer, int x, int y)
      This method renders the sprite to the screen with a specific rotation and scale.
      Parameters:
      renderer - The renderer to use.
      x - The x coordinate to render the sprite at.
      y - The y coordinate to render the sprite at.

    • applyTransform

      public void applyTransform()
      This method applies the current transformation to be reflected in transformed rendering. Call this method after changing the transform values like scale, rotation, and origin.

    • getTransformed

      public Sprite getTransformed()
      This method applies the current transformation to a copy of the sprite and returns it.
      Returns:
      The transformed sprite.

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(String path, String name)
      This method saves the Sprite to a file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to save the Sprite to.
      name - The name of the saved file.

    • setPixel

      public void setPixel(int x, int y, int color)
      This method sets a pixel on the sprite to the specified color.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the pixel.
      y - The y coordinate of the pixel.
      color - The color to set the pixel to.

    • getPixel

      public int getPixel(int x, int y)
      This method gets the color of a pixel on the sprite.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the pixel.
      y - The y coordinate of the pixel.
      Returns:
      The color of the pixel.

    • getPixels

      public int[] getPixels()
      This method gets the pixels of the sprite as an int[].
      Returns:
      The pixel array of the sprite.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      This method gets the width of the sprite.
      Returns:
      The width of the sprite.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      This method gets the height of the sprite.
      Returns:
      The height of the sprite.

    • setOrigin

      public void setOrigin(float oX, float oY)
      This method sets the origin offsets of the sprite.
      Parameters:
      oX - The normalized x offset of the origin.
      oY - The normalized y offset of the origin.

    • setScale

      public void setScale(float scaleX, float scaleY)
      This method sets the scale of the sprite for the transformed rendering.
      Parameters:
      scaleX - The x scale of the sprite.
      scaleY - The y scale of the sprite.

    • setAngleInRadians

      public void setAngleInRadians(float angleInRadians)
      This method sets the rotation of the sprite for the transformed rendering.
      Parameters:
      angleInRadians - The angle of the sprite in radians.

    • setAngleInDegrees

      public void setAngleInDegrees(float angleInDegrees)
      This method sets the rotation of the sprite for the transformed rendering.
      Parameters:
      angleInDegrees - The angle of the sprite in degrees.
